channel.title: Rise Of Nations
channel.description:
Dose anyone play rise of nations online?
also what do you use to play online Example : Gamespy
send me a message in inbox

item.title: Rise Of Nations
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:12, topic:393725”][quote author=Crown2 link=topic=490910.msg3590342#msg3590342 date=1304564431]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=490910.msg3589950#msg3589950 date=1304536208]

old as hell.
[/quote]Lold

Anything post 2000 is pretty damn new when it comes to PC gaming.

RoN is a pretty good game, me and maybe 5-6 other people from mitb played from time to time a couple of years back.

lol u guys should play agin exept i wanna play this time

u guys rush or what? what nations u guys use moslty?
[/quote]My tactics vary depending on situation, but obviously i play to win, and as such i rush. I’m too busy playing AoEO at the moment however, that and work takes up a lot of my time.[/quote]

oh i heard about aoeO is it good? and dont u have to have some code 2 play?

Read full topic
